examples: the cyclic pattern of the last two decades

definitions.definition: (of a group) having the property that each element of the group can be expressed as a power of one particular element.
relating to or denoting a musical or literary composition with a recurrent theme or structural device.
of or relating to a circle or other closed curve.
(of a polygon) having all its vertices lying on a circle.
(of a compound) having a molecular structure containing one or more closed rings of atoms.
(of a flower) having its parts arranged in whorls.
